homeTwoDes:
Each of the 10 buttons lets you explore 
an engine.Tap to see details, or long press 
to hear the engine sound.

ringtone.permission_redirect: Redirecting to settings to grant permission
ringtone.multiple_sims_message: Due to Android limitations, ringtone can only be set globally. You may set SIM-specific ringtones manually via system settings.
